message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Considering its value and potential, I'm asking for $22,000. This is a starting point for our discussion, and I'm open to hearing your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to stay within a budget of $10,000. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to offer $18,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value you mentioned earlier.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your budget constraints,  $18,000 is significantly less than what I had in mind. To move this forward, I can come down to $20,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $20,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $19,000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and my budget constraints.
